name: Spiriat
description:
He wakes up in a new world, without memories, where a voice tells him that he has to escape from the darkness that is chasing him. Fly at high speed! Absorb as many light orbs as you can to unlock the different graphic stories. Dodge the orbs of darkness that will delay you on your way! Only then you will meet the masters who will guide you to your destiny.

  • Voices in Spanish and English.
  • Discover who he is and what his mission is.
  • Simple and challenging mechanics.
  • Challenge your ability to dodge, only then you will get there.
  • Can you unlock all the graphics stories?
  • Do you think it will be easy?





  • Join in this search for the truth, through different scenarios full of color and music!




  • A challenging journey with an exciting and inspiring story.
